/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by a variety of buildings and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and motorcycles are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
